name: Cone of Cold
description: Cone of cold creates an area of extreme cold, originating at your hand and extending outward in a cone. It drains heat, dealing 1d6 points of cold damage per caster level (maximum 15d6). Arcane Material Component: A very small crystal or glass cone.

name: Fire Shield, Legion_s
